section.p: From your hiding-place you watch the man with the lamp glide past. He is tall and thin as a candle, with deep-set eyes and a face of ascetic concentration. From his bizarrely patterned robes you guess he might be a sorcerer - that, and the way the lantern floats obediently in the air just above his head. A good thing you stayed out of sight.
You slip out into the street. .
